description:
Temple is an active baselayer designed for multisport use. It is lightweight, has a slim fit and is packed with features to deliver performance in all conditions.
Temple uses ultra-lite Merino Air-Con 140. Nature's climate control - It keeps you cool when you're hot, warm when its not.
name: Mons Royale Temple Tech SS - Mens

specs.value: Merino Air-Con 140 - 83% Merino Wool, 13% Nylon, 4% Elastane
